scripts.dropdb: dropdb --if-exists burl && psql -d postgres -c 'DROP ROLE IF EXISTS burl'
scripts.createdb: psql -d postgres -c "CREATE ROLE burl WITH PASSWORD 'password' NOSUPERUSER NOCREATEDB NOCREATEROLE INHERIT LOGIN" && createdb burl -O burl && psql -d requiresafe -c 'create table if not exists shorts ( short char(10) primary key, url varchar(300), created date not null default CURRENT_DATE )'
scripts.resetdb: npm run dropdb && npm run createdb
